thread.title: Yeh Hai Mohobbatein Spoiler: Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed; Ishita Saves Shagun!
thread.title_full: Yeh Hai Mohobbatein Spoiler: Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed; Ishita Saves Shagun!

title: Yeh Hai Mohobbatein Spoiler: Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed; Ishita Saves Shagun!
text:
» Yeh Hai Mohobbatein Spoiler: Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed; Ishita Saves Shagun! Yeh Hai Mohobbatein Spoiler: Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed; Ishita Saves Shagun! In Yeh Hai Mohobbatein, Divya saves Gulabo from getting exposed. Ishita saves Shagun from Nidhi’s evil plan. Read on to know more… Published: Friday, February 24, 2017, 21:08   
In Yeh Hai Mohabbatein , Raman (Karan Patel) is seen in Gulabo's avatar to get closer to his wife Ishita ( Divyanka Tripathi ) and kids. On the other hand, Nidhi has also changed her avatar and entered Mani's house. She wants to separate Raman and Ishita, and uses Mani as her bait. Nidhi will be seen threatening Mani. She tells him that if he doesn't do as she says, she would hurt his aunt. Mani is helpless and dances to her tune. Read on to know the spoiler... Ishita 
As we reported earlier, Ishita will be organising Shagun's baby shower. The arrangements will be done by Mihika. The ladies will be seen in South Indian look (wearing saris). Nidhi-Mani 
Seeing Shagun happy, Mani will be glad. But Nidhi will have something else in store. Nidhi wants to spoil the function and she will be seen threatening Mani as well. Gulabo 
We had already reported how Nidhi would lash out at Gulabo, when the latter points out some error. During the function a neighbour sees a fruit missing and lashes out at Mihika. But, Nidhi will blame Gulabo for eating the fruit. Ishita gets upset with Gulabo. Nidhi-Mihika 
Nidhi wants to kill Shagun's unborn baby and mixes poison in the ‘payasam' that Mihika had prepared. Shagun will be asked to have the sweet. Ishita Saves Shagun! 
But, Ishita manages to save Shagun. Unknowingly, Ishita stops Shagun from having the ‘payasam'. May be Shagun will be called for some other ritual! Gulabo Dances With Ishita 
Also, during the function, the ladies will be seen dancing. Ishita dances with Mihika, while Gulabo too, joins them. Mihika comes in between Ishita and Gulabo, which irritates him and tries to get closer to Ishita. Divya Saves Gulabo From Getting Exposed! 
Abhishek's fiancée Divya, who helped Raman in the makeover, watches Gulabo closer to Ishita. Divya pulls Gulabo away from Ishita, thinking Ishita might doubt Gulabo as his beard was visible! Story So Far.... In the previous episode, we saw how Gulabo saved Ishita from the goons. Apparently, the goons tease Ishita. Raman aka Gulabo gets angry and end up fighting with them. Ishita praises Gulabo for being brave and strong. Also, we saw Mihika making arrangements for Shagun's baby shower. She reveals that the function will be simple with just a few guests. Aliya tells them that she will be dancing on the occasion, while Mani leaves the place, asking them to call him, if they need any help from him.The ladies select saris, while Raman (as Gulabo) gives Ishita her favourite sari, by lying that her mother-in-law gifted her.Adi wants to arrange the function, but Mihika tells that men are not allowed at the function. He gets upset and expresses his anger to Aliya.Meanwhile, Nidhi is annoyed seeing the arrangements and plans to destroy the function.In the upcoming episodes, we will see Adi taking Madrasi avatar and reaches Mani's house as a helper. He also takes Romi along him, who also is seen in Madrasi avatar. They will be seen serving juice to the guests. Other articles published on Feb 24, 2017 Please Wait while comments are loading...
